disease: Squamous cell carcinoma of skin, unspecified

symptoms.name: Non-healing sore or scab
symptoms.pattern: Persistent for about two months or longer

risk_factors: Excessive ultraviolet (UV) radiation exposure (sunlight, tanning beds)
Blond or red hair, light-colored eyes, freckles

required: Presence of a non-healing sore or scab lasting for at least two months
Presence of a persistent flat patch of scaly skin
